trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌，然后再抓若干牌，其数量等同于所有坟墓场中名称为CARDNAME之牌的数量。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."\n—Takara, to Eladamri
trans-unit.target: 「我已经看得够多，也听得够多了，此处的秘密中还藏有秘密。这就让你看看。」 ～塔卡菈致艾拉达力

trans-unit.source: Arcane Denial
trans-unit.target: 玄秘否定

trans-unit.resname: A25·41 | Arcane Denial | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.\nYou draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。在下一个回合维持开始时，其操控者可以抓至多两张牌。 在下一个回合维持开始时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: A25·42 | Bident of Thassa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bident of Thassa
trans-unit.target: 塔萨的双叉戟

trans-unit.resname: A25·42 | Bident of Thassa | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.\n{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。 {1}{U}，{T}：由对手操控的生物本回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: A25·42 | Bident of Thassa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.
trans-unit.target: 凡人的愿望如潮汐般多变。

trans-unit.resname: A25·43 | Blue Elemental Blast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue Elemental Blast
trans-unit.target: 蓝元素冲击波

trans-unit.resname: A25·43 | Blue Elemental Blast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Counter target red spell.\n• Destroy target red permanent.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •反击目标红色咒语。 •消灭目标红色永久物。

trans-unit.resname: A25·43 | Blue Elemental Blast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Nothing escapes a sharp mind.
trans-unit.target: 敏锐思维缚万物。

trans-unit.resname: A25·44 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blue Sun's Zenith
trans-unit.target: 蓝阳当空

trans-unit.resname: A25·44 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle CARDNAME into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌。将CARDNAME洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: A25·44 | Blue Sun's Zenith | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it."\n—Pelyus, vedalken ordinar
trans-unit.target: 「把原初疑问放一边。我们得先活下来才能继续探讨。」 ～维多肯维律者佩留斯

trans-unit.source: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
trans-unit.target: 草船借箭

trans-unit.resname: A25·45 | Borrowing 100,000 Arrows | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手每操控一个已横置的生物，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 孔明及鲁肃用计，使得魏国的军队对他们射了超过十万支箭；稍后在赤壁战争中，这些箭便用来对付魏国。

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: 脑力激荡

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后从你手上将两张牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Brine Elemental
trans-unit.target: 盐湖元素

trans-unit.resname: A25·47 | Brine Elemental | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 变身{5}{U}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，每位对手各略过其下一个重置步骤。

trans-unit.source: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.
trans-unit.target: 水分凝聚汇流，遗下一片干枯世界。

trans-unit.source: Choking Tethers
trans-unit.target: 窒息栓链

trans-unit.resname: A25·48 | Choking Tethers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap up to four target creatures.\nCycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, you may tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 横置至多四个目标生物。 循环{1}{U}（{1}{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，你可以横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Coralhelm Guide
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚盔向导

trans-unit.resname: A25·49 | Coralhelm Guide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {4}{U}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."\n—Jori En, expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「她熟知这片海岸的每一步路，无论是在地上或是海下，一路上都有她的藏身之处。她会把你带到的。」 ～探险队长裘黎恩

trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Court Hussar
trans-unit.target: 法庭轻骑兵

trans-unit.resname: A25·51 | Court Hussar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。 当CARDNAME进战场时，除非施放它时支付过{W}，否则牺牲之。

trans-unit.source: Curiosity
trans-unit.target: 好奇

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物向任一对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.
trans-unit.target: 米丽实在很想休息，可是她忍不住心中的怀疑，而跟随着寇维克斯潜行。

trans-unit.source: Cursecatcher
trans-unit.target: 捕咒师

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：除非目标瞬间或法术咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."
trans-unit.target: 「在会给偷走的东西里面，最宝贵的就是机会。」

trans-unit.resname: A25·54 | Dragon's Eye Savants | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragon's Eye Savants
trans-unit.target: 龙目学者

trans-unit.resname: A25·54 | Dragon's Eye Savants | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Morph—\nReveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.
trans-unit.target: 变身～从你手上展示一张蓝色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，检视目标对手的手牌。

trans-unit.source: Exclude
trans-unit.target: 排拒

trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Terrifying, but thankfully temporary."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「虽然恐怖，但所幸不会长留。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.source: Fathom Seer
trans-unit.target: 深测预言师

trans-unit.resname: A25·56 | Fathom Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Morph—\nReturn two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 变身～将两个由你操控的海岛移回其拥有者手上。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.source: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。如果你如此作，则除非你支付其至多减少{2}的法术力费用，否则牺牲之。

trans-unit.source: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.
trans-unit.target: 从扭转战局的效果看，任何战术都没有适时唤出凶猛巨兽来得有效。

trans-unit.resname: A25·58 | Freed from the Real | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Freed from the Real
trans-unit.target: 逸脱实界

trans-unit.resname: A25·58 | Freed from the Real | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\n{U}: Tap enchanted creature.\n{U}: Untap enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 {U}：横置所结附的生物。 {U}：重置所结附的生物。

trans-unit.resname: A25·58 | Freed from the Real | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.
trans-unit.target: 形体与能量将随坚强心灵而行。

trans-unit.resname: A25·59 | Genju of the Falls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Genju of the Falls
trans-unit.target: 瀑布源兽

trans-unit.resname: A25·59 | Genju of the Falls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant Island\n{2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.\nWhen enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于海岛 {2}：直到回合结束，所结附的海岛成为3/2蓝色，具飞行异能的精怪生物。它仍然是地。 当所结附的海岛进入坟墓场时，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Ghost Ship
trans-unit.target: 鬼船

trans-unit.resname: A25·60 | Ghost Ship | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {U}{U}{U}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Going down with the ship is just the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 随船只一同葬身大海，只是另一段开始。

trans-unit.source: Horseshoe Crab
trans-unit.target: 马蹄蟹

trans-unit.resname: A25·61 | Horseshoe Crab | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}: Untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {U}：重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.
trans-unit.target: 在大灾难发生的前几天，陶拉里亚上所有的螃蟹从河口、溪流与池塘奔游入海。但是没有一个人注意到这个异象。

trans-unit.resname: A25·62 | Jace, the Mind Sculptor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
trans-unit.target: 心灵塑师杰斯

trans-unit.resname: A25·62 | Jace, the Mind Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: +2：检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。你可以将该牌置于该牌手的牌库底。 0：抓三张牌，然后从你手上将两张牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。 −1：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 −12：放逐目标牌手牌库中的所有牌，然后该牌手将其手牌洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: A25·63 | Jalira, Master Polymorphist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
trans-unit.target: 变型宗师贾丽拉

trans-unit.resname: A25·63 | Jalira, Master Polymorphist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张非传奇的生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: A25·63 | Jalira, Master Polymorphist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."
trans-unit.target: 「我用心的话，能把你变成任何东西。」

trans-unit.source: Man-o'-War
trans-unit.target: 战舰水母

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."\n—Naimah, Femeref philosopher
trans-unit.target: 「外观上的美丽并不总是等同于触觉上的舒适。」 ～费米瑞甫哲学家奈玛

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Looter
trans-unit.target: 掠夺人鱼

trans-unit.resname: A25·65 | Merfolk Looter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼并不总知道自己要些什么，但他们相信找到时就会知道了。

trans-unit.resname: A25·66 | Murder of Crows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder of Crows
trans-unit.target: 乌鸦群

trans-unit.resname: A25·66 | Murder of Crows | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当另一个生物死去时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: A25·66 | Murder of Crows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.
trans-unit.target: 比起腐肉，他们更渴求死者的临终话语。

trans-unit.resname: A25·67 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic of the Hidden Way
trans-unit.target: 隐宗秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: A25·67 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked.\nMorph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 变身{2}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: A25·67 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."
trans-unit.target: 「世上没有不通的路，只有未觉之道。」

trans-unit.resname: A25·68 | Pact of Negation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pact of Negation
trans-unit.target: 逸散条约

trans-unit.resname: A25·68 | Pact of Negation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.\nAt the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 在你的下一个维持开始时，支付{3}{U}{U}。若你未如此作，则你输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: A25·68 | Pact of Negation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.
trans-unit.target: 动不动便疑心遭背叛的人，通常很少会失望。

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Bear
trans-unit.target: 幻象熊

trans-unit.resname: A25·69 | Phantasmal Bear | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."\n—Pol Jamaar, illusionist
trans-unit.target: 「你明知这不是真的，但当它向你挥爪，你知道些什么可一点也不重要。」 ～幻影师波贾玛

trans-unit.source: Reef Worm
trans-unit.target: 暗礁水蛆

trans-unit.resname: A25·70 | Reef Worm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with ‘\nWhen this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个3/3蓝色的鱼衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，派出一个6/6蓝色鲸鱼衍生生物，且具有『当此生物死去时，派出一个9/9蓝色巨海兽衍生生物』。」

trans-unit.source: Retraction Helix
trans-unit.target: 撤收螺旋

trans-unit.resname: A25·71 | Retraction Helix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物获得「{T}：将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。」

trans-unit.source: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.
trans-unit.target: 在空间崩塌的世界，乙太大师能收获超乎想象的力量。

trans-unit.source: Shoreline Ranger
trans-unit.target: 沿岸巡逻人

trans-unit.resname: A25·72 | Shoreline Ranger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nIslandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 循环海岛{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Sift
trans-unit.target: 详查

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「我已经让远古遗产从我手上溜掉两次了。绝不会还有第三次。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Totally Lost
trans-unit.target: 完全迷途

trans-unit.resname: A25·74 | Totally Lost | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Fblthp had always hated crowds.
trans-unit.target: 夫毕佐向来讨厌群众。

trans-unit.source: Twisted Image
trans-unit.target: 扭曲影像

trans-unit.resname: A25·75 | Twisted Image | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物的力量与防御力互换直到回合结束。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."\n—Politus, vedalken emisar
trans-unit.target: 「真正的力量来自心灵，因为身体这外型太易改变。」 ～维多肯传理使波礼多

trans-unit.source: Vendilion Clique
trans-unit.target: 薇安留聚群

trans-unit.resname: A25·76 | Vendilion Clique | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标牌手的手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。若你如此作，则该牌手展示所选的牌，将该牌置于其牌库底，然后抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
trans-unit.target: 维苏瓦变形兽

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield.
